Class Druid

java.lang.Object
characters.Character
characters.gauls.Gaul
characters.gauls.Druid
All Implemented Interfaces:
Leader, Worker
public class Druid extends Gaul implements Leader
Handles the creation of a Druid

  • Constructor Details

    • Druid

      public Druid(String name, Gender gender, int height, int age, int strength, int endurance, int health, int hunger, int belligerence, int magicPotionLevel, GaulType type)
      Creates a new Druid with the specified base attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - character's name
      gender - biological gender
      height - height in centimeters
      age - age in years
      strength - physical strength
      endurance - resistance to damage
      health - current health points
      hunger - current hunger level
      belligerence - aggressivity level
      magicPotionLevel - current magic potion amount
      type -

  • Method Details

    • lead

      public void lead()

      Specified by:
      lead in interface Leader

    • heal

      public void heal(Character character, int points)

    • makePotion

      public void makePotion(Ingredient ingredient)
      Attempts to cook a magic potion using the given ingredient. The ingredient must be present in the druid's inventory and allowed by the pot whitelist. If valid, the ingredient is added to the pot. Once all ingredients are added, the pot attempts to brew the potion.
      Parameters:
      ingredient - the ingredient to use for brewing
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the ingredient is not in the inventory

    • givePotion

      public void givePotion(Character target, Pot pot)
